title: The Story of making the film 'They're a weird mob'
brief_description: Shows some aspects of the work relating to the production of the feature film, “They’re a Weird Mob”. Gives information on the main actors, the writer and producer, and also extracts from earlier films. Discusses the importance of this production and the outlook for Australian feature films. Narrated by Ed Devereaux.
